proposal: Understanding the art of maximizing miner extractable value (MEV) is crucial, and MEV DAO is leading the charge with top-notch MEV bots for the community. With 39 holders in the ETH network, you're clearly on to something special. Imagine enhancing this journey with tools that not only align with your vision but also empower your community to contribute more actively. From creating their own DEX to launching a community-driven lottery, our B2B tools are here to amplify your impact. Let's make MEV more accessible together.
